How Easy Is This?

Creating blog posts with Hugo is incredibly simple:

  1. Create content: hugo new content trials_errors/my-post.md
  2. Edit the markdown: Add your content in simple markdown format
  3. Build the site: hugo command generates the static files
  4. Deploy: Copy the generated files to your GitHub Pages repository

Benefits of Using Hugo

  • Fast: Hugo builds sites incredibly quickly
  • Simple: Write in Markdown, no complex setup needed
  • Flexible: Easy to customize and extend
  • Version Control: Your content is in git, easy to track changes

This setup makes it much easier to create new blog posts compared to manually creating HTML files!
